c74object.name: mvc.snapshots
c74object.description: mvc.snapshots provides a way to store partial presets, with a faster loading time.

objarg.name: device-UID
objarg.digest: The device UID, to which this mvc.snapshots instance is bound.

attribute.name: warning
attribute.description: When a snapshot is recalled, some of its parameters may not exist in the current namespace (for instance, recalling values on parameters on channels beyond the current channel count of a multichannel component). If warning is enabled, a dialog box will pop up if this happens to notify the user.

method.name: GUI
method.description: The mvc.snapshots' GUI shows the available namespace in which a series of parameters can be selected to be saved as a snapshot. It also shows the missing parameters, that were featured in the last recalled snapshot, but are missing from the available namespace.
